mapper.select: select fv.id, fv.name, fv.unit, fv.fee_key_id, fk.id, fk.name fee_key_name from fee_value fv join fee_key fk on fv.fee_key_id = fk.id where fv.is_deleted = 0 and fk.is_deleted = 0 and fv.id in (select fee_value_id from apartment_fee_value where is_deleted = 0 and apartment_id = #{id})
